name: Chicken Enchiladas
ingredients: 1 C. sour cream 1/2 C. chopped olives (optional)
2 cans cream of chicken soup 1 bunch green onion (or regular onions)
steps: Green chilies to taste 4 cooked chicken breasts (cut up into bite size pieces)
Spices: Mrs. Dash or Season Salt, garlic (tiny bit), onion salt, salt and pepper. Add spices to taste.
Mix everything together except chicken, then remove 1 C. of mixture and then add chicken. Spray 9x13 pan
with Pam. Roll chicken mixture in flour tortillas and place in pan. Cover tortillas with remaining mixture.
Cook at 350 for 40 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with cheddar cheese, place back in oven until
